text: Canlubang is a corporated community and barangay in the Calamba City, Laguna, It is the 2nd largest and richest barangay in the Philippines in terms of tax income. Canlubang is an industral zone and one of the second largest barangay next in the town of Doña Remedios Trinidad in Bulacan, Philippines. ==Geography== The barangay is an under by the ruled late general José Yulo an Hiligaynon people from Bago city, Negros Occidental, When the sugarcane mill was launched in the barangay, In the mid 1970s. ===Divisions of barangay=== The barrio Canlubang is the poblacion (de facto) with Ceris 1&2, Today the seat government of the barangay is located at the Kapayapaanville, MCDC and its largest sitio is Asia-1.
